model_details.description: This model is the baseline model described in [Semi-supervised sequence tagging with bidirectional language models](https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:7197241). It uses a Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) character encoder as well as a GRU phrase encoder, and it starts with pretrained GloVe vectors for its token embeddings. It was trained on the CoNLL-2003 NER dataset.
model_details.short_description: NER tagger using a Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) character encoder as well as a GRU phrase encoder, with GloVe embeddings.

paper.title: Semi-supervised sequence tagging with bidirectional language models

dataset.name: CoNLL-2003 NER dataset
dataset.notes: The NER model was evaluated on the CoNLL-2003 NER dataset. Unfortunately we cannot release this data due to licensing restrictions.

dataset.name: CoNLL-2003 NER dataset
dataset.notes: The NER model was trained on the CoNLL-2003 NER dataset. Unfortunately we cannot release this data due to licensing restrictions.
